moparisthebest:

Thanks a lot sdouble, that is indeed very interesting. As long as the events are sent in that order they technically would have no reason at all to ban you, assuming you use the ‘I have a touch screen monitor’ defense.

http://villu-reborn.com/showthread.php?t=5121 Mopar, read this thread. Apparently the mouse movements being recorded has something to do with the UpText? It has to refresh or something before removing your Mouse? Anyways, I can’t really read java, so I don’t really understand the code in the first post, so i could be wrong…

item.title: Big'ol tip on mouse detection
item.dc:creator: @sdouble sdouble
item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

[quote=“pplsuqbawlz, post:29, topic:26264”]lol this is something semaphore and i have discussed before… ages ago.

You guys have fun doing the same :aight?[/quote]

Alright, thanks for the permission to have fun discussing this old topic.

So which one of you work for Jagex that can tell us the policy about ban appeals due to hardware? =] Long ago, I thought about writing a quick SCAR script with no mouse movements just to get banned and appeal with this “reason” just to see what they would say. But I never bothered. During your discussion, did you guys come to any conclusions?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2007, 07:16:51 PM[/size][hr][quote=“moparisthebest, post:30, topic:26264”][quote author=sdouble link=topic=39270.msg757374#msg757374 date=1168476136]
I have one at work. Visibly, the mouse pointer just jumps from where it was to where you touch instantly.
[/quote]

If you are able run this code at work do so and share what gets printed out 

...

If you want/need me to compile and upload it I will.[/quote]

I can’t run it, I get some javac is not recognized error.

I had to fix it, for some reason things were put on next lines even though they appear fine on the forum. A Tester.java file would have saved me 1 minutes time! Ran it, here are the results

C:\Documents and Settings\DA7200\Desktop>java Tester
To toggle listeners on and off:F1 : MouseListener F2 : MouseMotionListener F3 : KeyListener F4 : FocusListener
MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_ENTERED, 1168528238931, 0[], 51, 56, 0, false, 0);
MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_MOVED, 1168528238931, 0[], 51, 56, 0, false, 0);
MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_PRESSED , 1168528238971, 16[Button1], 51, 56, 1, false, 1);
MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_RELEASED, 1168528238971, 16[Button1], 51, 56, 1, false, 1);
MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_CLICKED , 1168528238971, 16[Button1], 51, 56, 1, false, 1);
MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_MOVED, 1168528240063, 0[], 332, 313, 0, false, 0);
MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_PRESSED , 1168528240103, 16[Button1], 332, 313, 1, false, 1);
MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_RELEASED, 1168528240103, 16[Button1], 332, 313, 1, false, 1);
MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_CLICKED , 1168528240103, 16[Button1], 332, 313, 1, false, 1);
MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_EXITED, 1168528241335, 0[], 685, 389, 0, false, 0);

C:\Documents and Settings\DA7200\Desktop>

I started with the cursor off of the window, then touched in the upper left, touched the lower right, touched outside of the window. I noticed the MOUSE_ENTERED is the same point where it clicks, so I guess there’s your answer about the mouse path. non-existent Let me know if there’s anything else I can help you with.

Read full topic

item.title: Big'ol tip on mouse detection
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

sdouble:

I have one at work. Visibly, the mouse pointer just jumps from where it was to where you touch instantly.

If you are able run this code at work do so and share what gets printed out 

import javax.swing.*;
import java.applet.Applet;
import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.*;

public class Tester extends Applet implements KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, FocusListener {

    public boolean mL, mML, kL, fL;

    public int width = 400;
    public int height = 400;
    public int x, y;
    String s = "";
    String focus = "";

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        JFrame.setDefaultLookAndFeelDecorated(true);
        JFrame frame = new JFrame("Tester");
        frame.setResizable(false);
        frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
        Tester tester = new Tester();
        tester.init();
        frame.add(tester);
        frame.setSize(400, 400);
        frame.setVisible(true);
    }

    public void init() {
        System.out.println("To toggle listeners on and off:
F1 : MouseListener
F2 : MouseMotionListener
F3 : KeyListener
F4 : FocusListener
");
        setSize(width, height);
        x = width / 2;
        y = height / 2;
        setBackground(Color.black);
        addMouseListener(this);
        addMouseMotionListener(this);
        addKeyListener(this);
        addFocusListener(this);

        mL = true;
        mML = true;
        //kL = true;
        //fL = true;
    }

    private void msg_mL(String s) {
        if (mL)
            System.out.println(s);
    }

    private void msg_mML(String s) {
        if (mML)
            System.out.println(s);
    }

    private void msg_kL(String s) {
        if (kL)
            System.out.println(s);
    }

    private void msg_fL(String s) {
        if (fL)
            System.out.println(s);
    }

    public void mousePressed(MouseEvent evt) {
        msg_mL("MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_PRESSED , " + evt.getWhen() + ", " + evt.getModifiers() + "[" + MouseEvent.getMouseModifiersText(evt.getModifiers()) + "], " + evt.getX() + ", " + evt.getY() + ", " + evt.getClickCount() + ", " + evt.isPopupTrigger() + ", " + evt.getButton() + ");");
    }

    public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent evt) {
        msg_mL("MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_RELEASED, " + evt.getWhen() + ", " + evt.getModifiers() + "[" + MouseEvent.getMouseModifiersText(evt.getModifiers()) + "], " + evt.getX() + ", " + evt.getY() + ", " + evt.getClickCount() + ", " + evt.isPopupTrigger() + ", " + evt.getButton() + ");");
    }

    public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent evt) {
        msg_mL("MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_CLICKED , " + evt.getWhen() + ", " + evt.getModifiers() + "[" + MouseEvent.getMouseModifiersText(evt.getModifiers()) + "], " + evt.getX() + ", " + evt.getY() + ", " + evt.getClickCount() + ", " + evt.isPopupTrigger() + ", " + evt.getButton() + ");
");
        x = evt.getX();
        y = evt.getY();
        s = "";
        repaint();
        evt.consume();
    }

    public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent evt) {
        msg_mL("MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_ENTERED, " + evt.getWhen() + ", " + evt.getModifiers() + "[" + MouseEvent.getMouseModifiersText(evt.getModifiers()) + "], " + evt.getX() + ", " + evt.getY() + ", " + evt.getClickCount() + ", " + evt.isPopupTrigger() + ", " + evt.getButton() + ");
");
    }

    public void mouseExited(MouseEvent evt) {
        msg_mL("MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_EXITED, " + evt.getWhen() + ", " + evt.getModifiers() + "[" + MouseEvent.getMouseModifiersText(evt.getModifiers()) + "], " + evt.getX() + ", " + evt.getY() + ", " + evt.getClickCount() + ", " + evt.isPopupTrigger() + ", " + evt.getButton() + ");
");
    }

    public void mouseDragged(MouseEvent evt) {
        msg_mML("MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_DRAGGED" + ", " + evt.getWhen() + ", " + evt.getModifiers() + "[" + MouseEvent.getMouseModifiersText(evt.getModifiers()) + "], " + evt.getX() + ", " + evt.getY() + ", " + evt.getClickCount() + ", " + evt.isPopupTrigger() + ", " + evt.getButton() + ");");
    }

    public void mouseMoved(MouseEvent evt) {
        msg_mML("MouseEvent(Component source, MouseEvent.MOUSE_MOVED" + ", " + evt.getWhen() + ", " + evt.getModifiers() + "[" + MouseEvent.getMouseModifiersText(evt.getModifiers()) + "], " + evt.getX() + ", " + evt.getY() + ", " + evt.getClickCount() + ", " + evt.isPopupTrigger() + ", " + evt.getButton() + ");");
        x = evt.getX();
        y = evt.getY();
        repaint();
        evt.consume();
    }

    public void keyPressed(KeyEvent evt) {
        msg_kL("KeyEvent(Component source, KeyEvent.KEY_PRESSED, " + evt.getWhen() + ", " + evt.getModifiers() + "[" + KeyEvent.getKeyModifiersText(evt.getModifiers()) + "], " + evt.getKeyCode() + "[" + KeyEvent.getKeyText(evt.getKeyCode()) + "], " + evt.getKeyChar() + ");");
        int i = evt.getKeyCode();
        if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F1)
            mL = !mL;
        else if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F2)
            mML = !mML;
        else if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F3)
            kL = !kL;
        else if (i == KeyEvent.VK_F4)
            fL = !fL;
        else if (i == KeyEvent.VK_ENTER) {
            s = "";
            repaint();
        }

        char c = evt.getKeyChar();
        if (c != KeyEvent.CHAR_UNDEFINED) {
            s = s + c;
            repaint();
            evt.consume();
        }
    }

    public void keyReleased(KeyEvent evt) {
        msg_kL("KeyEvent(Component source, KeyEvent.KEY_RELEASED, " + evt.getWhen() + ", " + evt.getModifiers() + "[" + KeyEvent.getKeyModifiersText(evt.getModifiers()) + "], " + evt.getKeyCode() + "[" + KeyEvent.getKeyText(evt.getKeyCode()) + "], " + evt.getKeyChar() + ");
");
    }

    public void keyTyped(KeyEvent evt) {
        msg_kL("KeyEvent(Component source, KeyEvent.KEY_TYPED, " + evt.getWhen() + ", " + evt.getModifiers() + "[" + KeyEvent.getKeyModifiersText(evt.getModifiers()) + "], " + evt.getKeyCode() + "[" + KeyEvent.getKeyText(evt.getKeyCode()) + "], " + evt.getKeyChar() + ");");
    }

    public void focusGained(FocusEvent evt) {
        msg_fL("FocusEvent(Component source, FocusEvent.FOCUS_GAINED, " + evt.isTemporary() + ");");
        focus = "GAINED, temp: " + evt.isTemporary();
        repaint();
    }

    public void focusLost(FocusEvent evt) {
        msg_fL("FocusEvent(Component source, FocusEvent.FOCUS_LOST, " + evt.isTemporary() + ");");
        focus = "LOST, temp: " + evt.isTemporary();
        repaint();
    }

    public void paint(Graphics g) {
        g.setColor(Color.gray);
        g.drawLine(x, y, x, y - 10);
        g.drawLine(x, y, x + 10, y);
        g.setColor(Color.green);
        g.drawString(x + "," + y, x - 20, y - 15);
        g.setColor(Color.orange);
        g.drawString(s, x + 2, y - 2);
        g.setColor(Color.yellow);
        g.drawString(focus, 1, 15);
    }
}

If you want/need me to compile and upload it I will.

Read full topic
